item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation Install with pip To install Magicweb, you need to have python and pip installed. To install with pip you can use the following command: pip install magicweb or python -m pip install magicweb. If neither of those work, try: pip3 install magicweb or python3 -m pip install magicweb. Install from source To install from source, clone the repo from github and install it with setup.py like so: git clone https://github.
